name: RM - Gothic - Victorian Revival
prompt: high victorian gothic atmosphere of {prompt} . heavy fog-laden ambiance, ornate intricate details, somber elegance, velvet and lace textures, melancholic gloom, shadowy depth, rich dark aesthetic, mourning atmosphere
negative_prompt: modern, bright, sunny, neon, minimalist, clean, concrete, sci-fi

name: RM - Gothic - Dark Romanticism
prompt: romantic gothic painting of {prompt} in the style of Caspar David Friedrich . sublime atmospheric terror, misty ethereal depth, contemplative solitude, moody chiaroscuro, 19th-century oil technique, vast emotional scale, haunting beauty
negative_prompt: happy, bright, pop art, cartoon, busy, crowded, urban, modern

name: RM - Gothic - Southern Gothic
prompt: southern gothic photography of {prompt} . oppressive humid atmosphere, decaying organic textures, pervasive rust and rot, swampy stagnation, uncanny isolation, grit and grime, haunting rural realism, worn surfaces
negative_prompt: clean, urban, futuristic, snowy, dry, desert, happy, pristine

name: RM - Gothic - Guillermo del Toro
